Plot: Uncle Oswald is, if you remember, the greatest rogue, bounder, connoisseur, bon vivant and fornicator of all time. Here, many famous names are mentioned and there is obviously a grave risk that families and friends are going to take offence... Uncle Oswald discovers the electrifying properties of the Sudanese Blister Beetle and the gorgeous Yasmin Howcomely, a girl absolutely soaked in sex, and sets about seducing all the great men of the time for his own wicked, irreverent reasons.
Characters: Uncle Oswald Hendryks Cornelius, Prof. A.R.Worsley, Yasmin Haukomli
Setting: London, England (United Kingdom), Paris (France), Khartoum (Sudan), Cambridge, England (United Kingdom) Madrid , 1919 (Spain) Vienna (Austria) Berlin (Germany), Cambridge, England (United Kingdom), Madrid (Spain), Vienna (Austria), Berlin (Germany)
